item.title: How To MAke A Wepon Owner Only?
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

First off, dont come here posting if you havent used the searchbar to find this.

But here it is.

if(wearID == xxxx && playerRights <= x){
sM(“Only the owner can wear this!”);
return false;
}

wearID == xxxx is the weapon/item id

&& playerRights <= x (<= x means playerRights 2 and down cannot wear)
You would want to change this to == 3 for owner ONLY.

Read full topic
item.source: How To MAke A Wepon Owner Only?
